long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily download HD images from eBay's product detail page with one click.(Supports all eBay country sites! ðŸŽ‰)
Download eBay images and save their details in an Excel file (*.xlsx).

# Getting Started
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
2. Open your target eBay product page.
3. Click on the eBay Image Downloader icon to open it.
4. Download product images .
5. Export images  to Excel.

# Features
1.Download Images(*.zip)
2.Export Images Details(*.xlsx)
3.One Click Download All Images(*.zip)
4.One Click Export All Details(*.xlsx)

# It's free?
Yes, eBay Image Downloader is free.
